alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 10 at 6:43AM CST until January 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Fillmore County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mist or light snow from the fog could freeze on pavement leading to slippery conditions. Motorists should slow down and be extra cautious on untreated roads, bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
